channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: ICB vehicle parked in EV bay, 30th July
item.description:
Diesel-engined vehicle parked in EV charging bay. Driver refused to move when asked.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Culford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree has branches resting on garage roof, 30th July
item.description:
The tree has long branches which are resting on my garage roof at the back of my property, which is Cranley, The Green. These branches are causing damage to my roof and need to be pruned. The branches also hang down over the grass verge which many people use to walk along and they cause an obstruction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grassington Road, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
